{{!-- Action: Go to the next screen --}}
{{!-- Action: Go to the previous LO --}} {{!-- Action: Open the table of content --}} {{!-- Action: Shows a dialog with a rich text input field to allow the learner to takes notes --}} {{!-- Action: Shows a dialog with special characters to allow the learner to introduce them into the current activity --}} {{!-- Action: Drop an item from the wordpool (OS Box Drop only) --}} {{!-- Action: Toogle the wordpool animation (OS Box Drop only) --}} {{!-- Action: Highlights areas that require correction (Turn on) --}} {{!-- Action: Highlights areas that require correction (Turn off) --}} {{!-- Action: Highlights areas that require correction for a limited period of time (IM Proofing only) --}} {{!-- Action: Reveal Object. Presents hidden text or images --}} {{!-- Action: Reveal Object. Hide a previously showed hidden text or image --}} {{!-- Action: Shows a dialog with hints to solve the activity ENGINE Selectors: .hint-label, .hint-1, .hint-2 & .hint-3 Note: The label content can be overwriten in Author --}} {{!-- Action: Reveal the answer for the first empty or wrong question. It doesn't mark wrong questions in any way, but it change the answer to the right one (if that's the next question) --}} {{!-- Action: Confirm the right answers selected and reveal the answers for every empty question. It doesn't mark wrong questions in any way, but it change the asnwers to the right ones --}} {{!-- Action: Confirm the right answers selected and reveal the answers for every empty or wrong question --}} {{!-- Action: Reveal the answer for the first empty question and only that one. It doesn't mark wrong questions in any way and ignores wrong answered questions --}} {{!-- Action: Confirm if the answered question are correct or wrong --}} {{!-- Clear the answer from the current screen --}} {{!-- Clear the answer from the every screen --}} {{!-- Action: Try again --}} {{!-- Action: Manually save the current progress in the LO --}} {{!-- Action: Export the current activity as a file (RTF or PDF) --}} {{!-- Action: Toogle the fullscreen mode --}} {{!-- Action: Shows a dialog with microphone settings --}} {{!-- Action: Shows a dialog with copyright information --}} {{!-- Action: Shows a dialog with help information --}} {{!-- Action: Send the scores gathered by Check Answer validations to the hosting environment. It doesn't validate anything for itself and it doesn't present the score to the learner. It's only displayed on the last activity screen --}} {{!-- Action: Check answers and send the results --}} {{!-- Action: Move from the end result screen to your answers after submit. It's only displayed on the end result screen --}} {{!-- Action: Go back to the end result screen after submit --}} {{!-- Action: Go to the next LO --}}
